contents: @金恩王: 你没看到文章说藏族人普遍携带而其他人极少携带的EPAS1基因是从丹尼索瓦人来的吗？Re-sequencing the region around EPAS1 in 40 Tibetan and 40 Han individuals, we find that this gene has a highly unusual haplotype structure that can only be convincingly explained by introgression of DNA from Denisovan or Denisovan-related individuals into humans.
